message.content:
cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the development of an ontology for emergency management during hazard crises, which involves capturing and integrating information from various sources. This suggests that the paper could fall under the categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Cybersecurity and Privacy (cs.CY), as these fields often deal with data integration and analysis. Additionally, the paper may also fall under the categories of Cryptography and Security (cs.CR), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), as these fields are relevant to the use of social media content and local sensors in emergency management.
